safetyTips: Deliveries & collections are both contactless. Our delivery drivers will leave all produce in a safe place, which we will agree with you over the phone. We will ring the doorbell and/or knock on the door, so please acknowledge your delivery driver in some way (a simple wave from the window is enough!).
name: MACKNADE
address: Open in Ashford on Saturdays for collections only: No.1 Elwick Place. Ashford. Kent. TN23 1AE.  Still open in Faversham: Macknade Food Hall. Faversham. Kent ME13 8XF.
description: Famous for our Flagship Faversham Food Hall and recently opening in Elwick Place, Macknade is now able to offer home delivery to the people of Ashford, featuring delicious food & drink from our greengrocers, delicatessen, butchery, grocers & wine shop. This applies to all TN23, TN24 and TN25 postcodes, plus Challock, Boughton Lees and Wye. You can choose from a pre-made box or supply your own bespoke grocery list. A contactless collections service is also available from Elwick Place every Saturday afternoon.  There are two ways of placing an order. Submit your order using our online form https://macknade.com/orders-for-delivery-collection/ or call us on 01795 534497 to speak with one of the team.
